commandobject.name: ChangeWeapon
commandobject.documentation: Switch the bots weapon to another.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Unique Id of weapon to switch to. If you just send "Best" as Id, the server will pick your best weapon that still has ammo for you. Obtain Unique Id's from AIN messages. Be carefull, the weapon Id in bots inventory is different from the Ids of weapons that are lying in the map!
